title: Connecting to RDP server fails with error 2056
author: PieterStoffelen
body_snippet:
We have a 2016 server with 5 CALS so 5 people can connect with RDP.
If we do this with mRemoteNG 1.76.20.24615 we get the error:
----------
WarningMsg
10/27/2020 16:34:34
RDP verbinding verboken!
2056 De externe computer heeft de sessie beÃ«indigd vanwege een fout in het licentieprotocol.
Probeer of u opnieuw verbinding met de externe computer kunt maken of neem contact met de beheerder van de server op.
----------

So we get a licence protocol error with number 2056 snd the connection ...

iterations.description: Connecting to an RDP server fails with a specific error code (2056), indicating a bug in the RDP connection handling.

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Connecting to an RDP server fails with a specific error code (2056), indicating a bug in the RDP connection handling.
Approach: Investigate the RDP connection and error handling logic within RdpProtocol.cs to understand the cause of error 2056 and implement a fix, potentially involving adjustments to connection parameters or improved error reporting.
